text: Intimidator 305 is a roller coaster at Kings Dominion. It opened in 2010. It is 305 feet tall and gets as fast as 90 miles per hour. The roller coaster is themed to NASCAR driver Dale Earnhardt. == References == *https://www.kingsdominion.com/rides-experiences/intimidator-305 Category:Operating roller coasters Category:Roller coasters by name
title: Intimidator 305
